bullets: Spearheaded the planning and execution of cultural and literary events celebrating French language and Francophone culture.
Collaborated with teams to manage logistics, promotions, and event budgets, ensuring seamless operations.
Conceptualized and organized workshops, competitions, and festivals to engage and educate members.
Developed and implemented strategies to improve operational efficiency, reduce costs, and increase productivity.
Mentored junior staff in the organization's business processes, customer service standards, and quality assurance protocols.
